tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE PremiumPayments ( payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, policy_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, payment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE PolicyRenewals ( renewal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, policy_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, renewal_date DATE NOT NULL, renewal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, renewed_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Policyholders ( policyholder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, policyholder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, policyholder_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, policyholder_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL );
